name: simple-adventure-server
description: Simple MMO RPG pixel game based on websocket.

scripts.socket-io:serve: npm run database:run && SERVER_MODE=socket-io ts-node-dev --respawn index.ts
scripts.sock-js:serve: npm run database:run && SERVER_MODE=sock-js ts-node-dev --respawn index.ts
scripts.database:run: sudo docker stop $(sudo docker ps -aq) && sudo docker start simple-adventure-db && sudo docker start simple-adventure-phpmyadmin
